鵌字的基本解释

鵌
tú
古书上说的一种与鼠同穴而居的鸟。

鵌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《廣韻》同都切，平模，定。］
［《廣韻》以諸切，平魚，以。］
亦作“1”。
一种与鼠同穴而居的鸟。

鵌字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵌； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1489第21
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?同都切，音徒。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳥䑕同穴，其鳥爲鵌，其䑕爲鼵。【郭註】鵌似鵽而小，黃黑色，穴入地三四尺，䑕在內，鳥在外。今在首陽縣，鳥䑕同穴山中。【尙書孔傳】共爲雌雄。【地理記】不爲牝牡。又【廣韻】以諸切【集韻】羊諸切，?音余。義同。一作?。【揚雄·蜀都賦】??鴝䳨。又【山海經】翼望山有鳥，狀如烏，三首六尾，善笑。名鵸䳜。【又】帶山有鳥，狀如烏，五采赤文，亦名鵸䳜。【太平御覽】善芳一作獻芳。鵸䳜者，卽獻芳鳥也。鵽原从鳥从叕作。

鵌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵌字的起名意思

暂无。

鵌
Basic explanation of words
鵌
tú
An ancient book said a bird that lives in the same cave with the rat.
鵌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tú］
["Guangyun" are cut in the same way, flat mold, fixed. ]
["Guangyun" is based on all cuts, flat fish, with. ]
Also known as "1".
A bird that lives in the same burrow with rats.
鵌
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵌; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1489 21
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The same all cut, the sound disciple. 【Erya·Shiniao】The same point for the bird's qua, and its bird is 鵌, and its qua is 鼵. [Guo's Note] It is bright and small, yellow-black, three or four feet deep into the ground, with Qi inside and the bird outside. Today in Shouyang County, the birds are in the same cave in the mountains. [Guo Shu Kong Biography] There are males and females in total. [Geography] Not for Minmu. And [Guang Yun] Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] Sheep Zhu Qi,? Yin Yu. The same meaning. One for?. 【Yang Xiong·Shu Du Fu】?? Yuan Yan. Also [Shan Hai Jing] There are birds in Yiwang Mountain, like a black crow, with three heads and six tails, and a good smile. The name is 鵸䳜. [Also] There are birds in the belt mountain, which are like a black, and they are also called 鵸䳜. 【Taiping Yulan】Shanfang made an offering. For those who are loafers, 卽 presents the birds. The original is made from the bird.
